column2: Are you an experienced person in Aviation? Are you a person looking for a flexible work environment? Are you a curious and open-minded person? If this sounds like you, or you??e curious to learn more, then this role could be the perfect opportunity. Join our Aviation as our new Principal Engineer - Aviation and work with us to close the gap to a sustainable future. If this sounds like you, or you??e curious to learn more, then this role could be the perfect opportunity. Join our [department] as our new Principal Engineer, Aviation, REC and work with us to close the gap to a sustainable future. Your new role As our new Principal Engineer, Aviation, REC,Your roles and responsibilities will be .   Role: Airport Designer & Team Leader/Coordinator for two younger staff (expectedly the team will grow)     Responsibilities:       Prepare airport designs within earthworks/geometry and/or pavements, with primary focus on 3D modelling.   Coordinate design and drawings production for concept and detailed designs of airports   Prepare estimates of hours to complete certain design tasks, for use in proposals   Act as contact point between our Denmark-based Aviation Team and the Aviation Design Team in India   Coordinate workload within the Aviation Design Team in India   QA of the work produced by younger staff members   Be a source of technical and general learning for the younger staff       Years of experience range - 10 years minimum, 5 of these in roads or preferably in airport/aviation projects   Key competencies and skills ??Experience with civil works 3D design in roads or preferably airports, including earthworks/geometry and/or pavements Preparation of designs, CAD models and drawings. Expert knowledge of 3D design a must including alignments, corridors, templates & assemblies, and general terrain modelling.   Software experiences ??Expert capability in use of both OpenRoads and Civil 3D. Capability in use of ProjectWise. Experience with vehicle simulation software such as AviPLAN or AutoTURN is a benefit. About you  From the moment you start at Ramboll, we will support your personal and professional development so that you can continue to grow with the company. Whilst we look forward to supporting your continued learning and development, for this role we have identified some qualifications, skills, and capabilities that will set you up for success

column2: Job Description Summary   ?   Execute Stress analysis projects of Aircraft fuselage structures to ensure structural integrity using Nastran, Patran and Hypermesh.   ?   Key Responsibilities:     Responsible for performing structural analysis of aircraft components, assemblies, and systems while working as a coordinated team   Structural analysis includes calculation of loads, Static analysis, Fatigue analysis, Damage-Tolerance analysis, and Vibration analysis   Evaluate structural integrity of aircraft components by way of classical hand calculations and, finite element method   Generate documentation to report analysis and, test results to support certification/qualification   Support Gated Reviews to validate the quality and completeness of work packages   Familiar with regulatory framework (FAA and Mil-Spec), for warranting safety and regulatory compliance     .   Qualifications:     B.Tech or M.Tech in Aerospace Engineering or Mechanical Engineering. Advanced degree preferred.   10 to 14 years of experience  in  in Mechanical/Aerospace/Applied Mechanics/Structural engineering    Must have experience working with multi-functional teams spread across multiple products and locations within Boeing and external partners.   Must be flexible, with a high tolerance for organizational complexity and ability to work with partners from within Boeing and outside, across different cultures and time-zones.   Communication ??strong written and verbal communication skills, ability to prepare comprehensive reports, proposals. Candidate must be proficient in English, and familiar with MS Office tools.   Candidate must be a self-starter with a positive attitude, high ethics, and a track record of working optimally under pressure in a time-constrained environment.   Candidate must demonstrate excellent analytical and problem-solving skills   Ability to mentor and teach subordinates and partners to accomplish project and departmental goals and objectives.   Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience)   Experience in structural analysis of various airframe structures.   Experience with structural analysis of metallic and composite structures.   Experience with static and fatigue analysis   Knowledge of airplane operating environments   Robust understanding of engineering fundamentals such as material properties, Free-body diagrams, structural loads and analysis methods   Experience in applying FEM software (e.g., ABAQUS, LS-DYNA, PATRAN/NASTRAN, Hyperworks)   Experience or training with computer programming languages (e.g., Matlab, Python, Visual Basic)   Experience in applying industry CAD systems (e.g., NX/Teamcenter and CATIA/ENOVIA)   Candidate demonstrates excellent analytical and problem-solving skills   Good verbal and written communication skills to liaise with several Collaborators   Ability to work across functional teams and organizations   Willingness to expand into technical areas without prior experience   Desire to continuously improve our airplanes

column2: Greetings from Ashkom! We are sharing the JD for the role of  Operator  for the company name "AVIRATA DEFENCE SYSTEMS (A SASMOS Divison)"   ,  position based at  Pune (Chakan)   plant.  You'll be hired on the payroll of  Ashkom Media India Pvt. Ltd.  Kindly go through the attached JD and if interested revert me back with your feedback and updated resume. Job Profile-   Electrical Operator Location - Pune Chakan Experience?-? Fresher Qualification?-?Diplowma & ITI (electrical and electronics) Date?-   08?To 09   June?2023 Role & Responsibilities Operates plant equipment to generate enough electrical power to meet demand; regulates flow of power between generating stations and substations. Uses software, tools, and other devices to control and change equipment settings. Monitors plants and dams and coordinates stream flow to meet power demands. Regulates transmission loads, frequencies, and line voltages. Performs preventive and required maintenance and troubleshoots equipment problems; tasks may include testing auto-start features or repacking valves. Inspects turbines, generators, boilers, and other equipment; makes necessary repairs or modifications. Cleans, lubricates, and maintains parts and equipment to prevent failure and degradation. Drafts and maintains documentation related to equipment, rainfall data, and general operating instructions and schedules. Maintains knowledge of plant operation best practices and safety protocols, which may include active participation in refresher and new training coursework. Performs other related duties as assigned. Requirement: 1. Candidate must have passed Diploma &ITI in Electrical / Electronic only ( No B.E candidates & No other branch candidates) 2. Age Limit Below 22 years, preferably fresher. Selection Procedure: 1.   1st Round Written Test (1 hour Time): 50 Marks Question Paper, minimum passing mark is 25 2.   2nd Round - those who pass the test can attend the Next round of Technical Interview 3.   3rd Round HR Interview. Note: Final offer subject to clearance of medical fitness test & Eye test. Since we are into defence products passing eye test is very important. Interview Date-   08?To 09   June?2023 Address- CHAKAN INDUSTRIAL AREA, PAP-G-13, Phase 2, Sawardari, Maharashtra 410501 -- Warm Regards________________________ ?Your Manpower Manager? Udit Agnihotri HR- Recruiter 9977082289 Ashkom Media India Private Limited ?Ashkom House? DK2/6 Danish Kunj, Kolar Road, Bhopal- 462042 udit.ashkom@gmail.com Website: www.ashkom.com

column2: Ensure embedded system design activities on Flight Control System perimeter:   o To capture all the requirement    o To analyze the requirements and define a solution   o To specify the evolutions   o To write the textual specification   o To design the formal specification (logic and symbology)   o To implement corrective actions further to specification review before standard delivery   o To define V&V strategy of this evolution   o To proof-read the test procedure (if any)   o To write a Technical Report or System Interface Description or other document types   Profile          Desired Candidate Profile   3+ Years of experience in embedded system design with the following skills:    Generic Skills:    o Aeronautics / Avionics    o Electronic / Automatic   o V Cycle Principle   o Aeronautical Technical Documentation     Specific Skills:   o Flight Control Laws   o Flight Control System    o + Aeronautical Systems knowledge (ATAs) is a plus   Soft Skills:   o Ability to communicate and manage equipment suppliers and test laboratories    o Problem-solving skill to quickly and properly assess a situation    o Good written and verbal communication skills   o English intermediate level is mandatory     Role Category: System Engineering & Design   Education   Aeronautical or Electrical engineering diploma     Key Skills   Aeronautic experience   Avionics   Embedded System Design with strong knowledge on V-Cycle   Flight Control   SCADE

column2: We are seeking a UAV Flight Line Operators who have sound judgment, excellent interpersonal skills and high standards. Success will require attention to detail, a safety-oriented attitude, flexibility, and enthusiasm for cutting-edge technology.      You will be responsible for operations of our Aerial Targets ( AT ) during company and customer campaigns and to ensure that the missions are completed as per customer requirements. This candidate is expected to work closely with engineering and other teams to deliver on their assigned responsibilities with minimal supervision.        Responsibilities            Setup:    Set up of Ops Site for conducting operations including handling logistics and documentation.        Assembly:    Assemble the ATs; Assemble the GCS and Target Launcher        Take Off:    Conduct pre-flight inspection with ATs, Work with Flight Controllers to launch ATs, Prepare ground equipment for launching the ATs and inbound ATs        Drone Technical Maintenance:    Perform AT field maintenance, repair any AT that have experienced incidents and prepare ATs for repeat missions. Perform Launcher and GSE field maintenance        Troubleshooting:    Collaborate with engineering team to troubleshoot optimize issues        Integration:    Integration of ATs at the Facility during non campaign periods          Requirements          Hands-On Attitude: Must enjoy hands-on work and be adept at working with mechanical or electrical systems      Strength: You will be lifting up to 50lbs. objects regularly      Poise: Maintain a cool head under high pressure situations      Extremely process detail-oriented      Must be able to travel 30% 40%, as necessary      Ability to maintain focus during extended daily flight operations      Comfortable troubleshooting mechanical and electrical issues with complex, battery-operated machinery      Proficiency in spoken and written English      Proficiency in spoken and written English          Preferred Qualifications          Degree or Diploma in Mechanical/Electrical/Aerospace Engineering    OR        3+ years working experience as a Maintenance Technician for Aircrafts, Power Turbines, Mining Equipment, or other Complex Technical Equipment          What to Expect          You will receive training with the rest of the Flight Ops team to learn on the job.      You will become a certified Flight Op professional Being able to handle Launcher Setup, Pre-flight, Post-flight, preparing and Launching ATs, and incident response alone, and have a thorough understanding of Kadet DS hardware.      You will have mastered vehicle maintenance, troubleshooting recurring incidents and processes. You will be responsible to contribute regarding process and vehicle improvements.      You will be looked to as someone looked at as a leader for the UAS Facility, fielding questions from your team and helping onboard new apprentices coming on-board        Location: Bengaluru with Initial Training to be conducted in Kolkata.
column11: Mining, Training, vehicle maintenance, Interpersonal skills, Line Operator, Aerospace, Mechanical, Machinery, google maps, Logistics
